newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Japan plans to buy 500 T Pakistani super rice.
newsitem.headline: Japan plans to buy 500 T Pakistani super rice.

text.p: Japan plans to buy at least 500 tonnes of Pakistan's super Basmati rice in October or November, exporters said on Wednesday.

A three-member Japanese team had shown interest in buying at least 500 tonnes of super Basmati variety rice, exporter Khalid Ghori of Matco Rice Processing told Reuters after the team visited Matco's plant in Karachi.
"The team plans to introduce super Basmati at American food restaurants in Japan," Ghori said.
Japan imported two consignments of 56 tonnes each of Basmati rice in the past one year, another exporter said.
New crop Basmati rice would reach local markets in October, Ghori said. --Ibrahim Khan 9221-5685192
